amendment.description: To require that the hydrogen commercialization plan of the Department of Energy include a description of activities to support certain hydrogen technology deployment goals.

vote.text: Amendment SA 865 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 32. Record Vote Number: 212.

action.text: Amendment SA 865 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S7516-7526; text: CR S7516) To require that the hydrogen commercialization plan of the Department of Energy include a description of activities to support certain hydrogen technology deployment goals.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 865 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 865 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 32. Record Vote Number: 212.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 865 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 32. Record Vote Number: 212.
